JobTitle: Systems Engineer - Radar Mode / Algorithm Development
JobFullDesc: Raytheon Intelligence and Space (RIS) is growing!  We have an immediate career growth opportunity for a Radar Systems Engineer to join our Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance Systems (ISRS) Mission Area - Surveillance RADAR Department (SRD), Advanced RF Systems Section.Explore RI&S: Raytheon Intelligence & SpaceThe Radar Systems Engineer will join our Radar Sensor Systems (RSS) product line team to provide radar algorithm / signal processing mode development to support distributed aperture radar programs. Mode development includes working on multi-function radar capabilities such as AMTI, GMTI, maritime surveillance, sense and avoid, weather detection, terrain detection/avoidance, and communications.You will perform radar and communications mode design, conduct design and development of radar and communication waveforms as well as support signal processing and waveform analyses; develop mathematical algorithms for radar signal processing; make performance predictions and analyze data received from the radar to evaluate algorithm performance; make technical presentations and participate in technical product reviews;
